exceptions.tactic: destruct (incr_unital_iff_residual worlds R po_R J SA).
exceptions.exn: In environment worlds : Type R : Relation worlds po_R : PreOrder Krelation J : Join worlds SA : SeparationAlgebra worlds dSA : DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra worlds The term "worlds" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "IncreasingSeparationAlgebra ?worlds".

In environment worlds : Type R : Relation worlds J : Join worlds dSA : DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra worlds H : IncreasingSeparationAlgebra worlds -> ResidualSeparationAlgebra worlds -> UnitalSeparationAlgebra worlds H0 : IncreasingSeparationAlgebra worlds -> UnitalSeparationAlgebra worlds -> ResidualSeparationAlgebra worlds join_comm : forall m1 m2 m : worlds, join m1 m2 m -> join m2 m1 m join_assoc : forall mx my mz mxy mxyz : worlds, join mx my mxy -> join mxy mz mxyz -> exists myz : worlds, join my mz myz /\\ join mx myz mxyz PreOrder_Reflexive : Reflexive Krelation PreOrder_Transitive : Transitive Krelation Unable to unify "ResidualSeparationAlgebra worlds" with "UnitalSeparationAlgebra worlds".

In environment worlds : Type R : Relation worlds J : Join worlds dSA : DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra worlds H : IncreasingSeparationAlgebra worlds -> ResidualSeparationAlgebra worlds -> UnitalSeparationAlgebra worlds H0 : IncreasingSeparationAlgebra worlds -> UnitalSeparationAlgebra worlds -> ResidualSeparationAlgebra worlds join_comm : forall m1 m2 m : worlds, join m1 m2 m -> join m2 m1 m join_assoc : forall mx my mz mxy mxyz : worlds, join mx my mxy -> join mxy mz mxyz -> exists myz : worlds, join my mz myz /\\ join mx myz mxyz PreOrder_Reflexive : Reflexive Krelation PreOrder_Transitive : Transitive Krelation H1 : IncreasingSeparationAlgebra worlds -> (UnitalSeparationAlgebra worlds -> ResidualSeparationAlgebra worlds) /\\ (ResidualSeparationAlgebra worlds -> UnitalSeparationAlgebra worlds) Unable to unify "(UnitalSeparationAlgebra ?worlds -> ResidualSeparationAlgebra ?worlds) /\\ (ResidualSeparationAlgebra ?worlds -> UnitalSeparationAlgebra ?worlds)" with "UnitalSeparationAlgebra worlds".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment worlds : Type R : Relation worlds po_R : PreOrder Krelation J : Join worlds SA : SeparationAlgebra worlds dSA : DownwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra worlds H : UnitalSeparationAlgebra worlds Unable to unify "ResidualSeparationAlgebra ?worlds" with "forall m n m1 m2 : worlds, join m1 m2 m -> m <= n -> exists n1 n2 : worlds, join n1 n2 n /\\ m1 <= n1 /\\ m2 <= n2".

original: assert (UnitalSeparationAlgebra worlds). - destruct (incr_unital_iff_residual worlds R po_R J SA). apply H0. auto. apply incr_unital_iff_residual; auto. - apply unital_is_residual; auto.
